data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 953 believers in Xiangkhoang that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Xiangkhoang, Laos
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Xiangkhoang, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Xiangkhoang words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Xiangkhoang who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 953 believers in Xiangkhoang, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Xiangkhoang to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 36,547 lost in Xiangkhoang that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

location.name: Xiangkhoang
location.people_groups_list: Tai Dam, Khmu, Pong, Nung, Tai Sam
